title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 September 2012 - XWiki
content:

09:07 <CIA-122> tmortagne master \* rd84095b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/d84095bdd17856d7bb048ea213021cbfbe6686ff / (23 files in 23 dirs): XE-1188: XAR extensions embedded in the hsqldb/jetty distribution are not listed as such - http://git.io/FZ5AOg  
09:07 <CIA-122> tmortagne master \* rf6fe5d2 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/f6fe5d2ab0f2eb56129f75b9e45c2f40283e55ab / (3 files in 3 dirs): XE-1188: XAR extensions embedded in the hsqldb/jetty distribution are not listed as such - http://git.io/tmxIiA

10:24 <vmassol> jvdrean: good morning, would you remind me when hiddenFilter was introduced, re http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8160 ?  
10:24 <vmassol> in other words, I'd like that we set the affects to the oldest affected version in http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8160  
10:24 <vmassol> right now it says 4.2M2, is that the oldest affected version?  
10:25 <vmassol> if you have the jira that introduced hiddenfilter, we could link it  
10:26 <+tmortagne> seems to be XWIKI-7568  
10:26 <+jvdrean> vmassol: it was during 4.0  
10:27 <vmassol> so 4.0RC1?  
10:27 <+jvdrean> yes  
10:31 <vmassol> thanks  
11:12 <CIA-122> tmortagne master \* rb66d927 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b66d927b5b4e4b6869f31dc30d374ec13c77113e / xwiki-platform-tools/xwiki-platform-tool-packager-plugin/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/tool/backup/Importer.java : XWIKI-8184: Make importer mojo of packager plugin support generating extensions index - http://git.io/aq-Fow  
11:28 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
11:31 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r246b165 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/246b165f88c121884d7505dc5ad6a8624236d704 / (3 files in 3 dirs): XCOMMONS-262: Enforce usage of Commons Lang 3.x - http://git.io/ia2v8g  
11:31 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r929ff56 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/929ff56d3c40597460499985f3c407ca58a6e6b7 / (3 files in 3 dirs): XCOMMONS-262: Enforce usage of Commons Lang 3.x - http://git.io/B3kIRA  
11:37 <CIA-122> tmortagne master \* rabfa57b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/abfa57b249720b1e4c6402bc7462eaf7b0855738 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-8184: Make importer mojo of packager plugin support generating extensions index - http://git.io/HdJIpQ  
11:52 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
12:19 <vmassol> guys I'm going to propose dates for 4.3. We need it to be short (around 1.5 month) so that we can finish the 4.x cycle as close to the end of the year as possible, to try to get 1 cycle per year and succeed next year  
12:19 <vmassol> wdyt about:  
12:19 <vmassol> - 4.3M1: 15 oct (3w)  
12:19 <vmassol> - 4.3M2:  29 Oct (2w)  
12:19 <vmassol> - 4.3RC1: 5 Nov (1w)  
12:19 <vmassol> - 4.3Final: 12 Nov (1w)  
12:20 <vmassol> then we'll have 4.4 and 4.5 which will be bugfix  
12:20 <vmassol> which should lead us around feburary for 4.5 fina  
12:20 <vmassol> final  
12:21 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:23 <sburjan> has quit  
12:28 <vmassol> tmortagne, mflorea: wdyt?  
12:28 <vmassol> jvdrean: ?  
12:29 <+mflorea> +1  
12:31 <+jvdrean> +1  
12:31 <+tmortagne> +1  
12:45 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
12:49 <vmassol> ok thanks guys  
13:08 <vmassol> this could be interesting for us in our jenkins: https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Promoted+Builds+Plugin  
13:09 <vmassol> we could promote our XE build only when all functional tests pass for example  
13:23 <mflorea> has quit  
13:26 <vmassol> fixing platform build  
13:48 <sburjan\_> has quit  
13:52 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
13:59 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki

14:47 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r0be0eed https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/0be0eed562b1f0f338491263633e5abe82c636d3 / pom.xml : XCOMMONS-262: Enforce usage of Commons Lang 3.x - http://git.io/EpduLQ

14:54 <nIMBVS> has left #xwiki

15:07 <vmassol> I must have broken sometihng again, checking  
15:13 <vmassol> hmm works fine locally  
15:17 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/2562/consoleFull  
15:18 <vmassol> index tests works fine for me  
15:18 <vmassol> the error is:  
15:18 <vmassol> Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: JAR entry META-INF/components.txt not found in /home/hudsonagent/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/rendering/xwiki-rendering-transformation-macro/4.2-SNAPSHOT/xwiki-rendering-transformation-macro-4.2-SNAPSHOT.jar  
15:18 <vmassol> so it looks like some corrupted jar  
15:37 <vmassol> jvdrean: thanks  
15:38 <vmassol> jvdrean: hmm the issue is 8160 actualy  
15:38 <vmassol> fixing  
15:40 <+jvdrean> vmassol: right sorry about that, I copy/pasted from the email

18:01 <CIA-121> has joined #xwiki  
18:18 <polx> has quit  
18:22 <+sburjan> tmortagne: not sure I fully understand your comment on XWIKI-8203  
18:24 <+tmortagne> sburjan: my comment is that I doubt you get the second screenshot by doing what you explained since what you display is not the UI extension details but the WAR extension dependencies  
18:24 <+sburjan> I click on "Show Details" on the XWiki Enterprise - Web  
18:24 <+sburjan> \_not\_ on UI  
18:25 <+tmortagne> there is no such button  
18:25 <+tmortagne> I see hide details  
18:25 <+tmortagne> but not show details  
18:25 <+tmortagne> in your first screenshot  
18:25 <+tmortagne> and when you show details you don't get the dependencies  
18:26 <+sburjan> i click on "Show Details" and I get the two tabs. "Description" and "Dependencies"  
18:26 <+sburjan> first screenshot is with the Description tab, secnod screen is with "Dependencies" tab  
18:28 <+tmortagne> ok it's not very clear, from your description I understood that you were getting UI details  
18:28 <+sburjan> updated the issue. I am getting the XWiki Enterprise - Web details  
18:28 <+tmortagne> since that's the actually action you are asked to do  
18:28 <+sburjan> UI details worked quite well  
18:30 <+tmortagne> actually both work well but what I explain in the comment is that XWiki needs to access remote repository to get proper details about the WAR and that it does not do it right away (since technically it's useless and should not block the XWiki startup)  
18:30 <vmassol> tmortagne: it's still wrong to display ${platform.version}  
18:31 <+tmortagne> vmassol: the generic code does not really know more at this point without accessing remote repository  
18:31 <+sburjan> yes, that is the second screenshot fr. maybe I should have highlighted that, making it easier to see  
18:31 <vmassol> what I mean is that we need to do somerhing about this  
18:31 <vmassol> either hide the button  
18:31 <vmassol> but we cannot have something wrong  
18:31 <+tmortagne> I did not closed the issue...  
18:31 <vmassol> ok good  
18:31 <vmassol> :)  
18:32 <+sburjan> :)  
18:32 <+tmortagne> I'm just explaining what's happening  
18:32 <+sburjan> I was imagining that since I have platform on my local hard drive, I should also be able to see the version  
18:33 <+sburjan> I'm the dumb user here  
18:34 <+tmortagne> sburjan: it's not exactly like that, what the module gets is the pom.xml of the WAR extension but nowere you have the parent of this pom locally so it can't resolve the variable  
18:34 <+tmortagne> so we need to find a way to get those informations locally  
18:34 <+sburjan> didn't knew that  
18:35 <+tmortagne> the UI is resolved from a remote repository so you get proper informations  
18:35 <+sburjan> yepp.  
18:36 <+tmortagne> we should probably not try to display all the informations of the distribution WAR for now, the name/version is enough for the need  
18:37 <+sburjan> exactly what I was thinking now  
18:37 <+sburjan> now I've hit the issue about the merge conflict of XWiki.XWikiPreferences. Which option should I choose to proceed for having a clean install ?  
18:37 <+tmortagne> take the new version  
18:38 <+tmortagne> you get that because XWikiPreference is generated at init  
18:38 <+tmortagne> you will get the same for several classes  
18:38 <+tmortagne> all the standards classes basically  
18:38 <+tmortagne> we know about it but it's a bit tricky to take care of this cleanly so we tough it was ok for M3  
18:39 <+sburjan> I see  
18:39 <+sburjan> thanks for explaining. sorry for being a pita  
18:39 <+tmortagne> basically we need to find a way to make Extension Manager aware of theses generated documents  
18:39 <+tmortagne> sburjan: nothing to be sorry of, that's your job  
18:40 <+sburjan> what are the side effects of removing the generation from init ?  
18:40 <+tmortagne> we are not going to do that :)  
18:40 <+tmortagne> actually our goal is to make Extension Manager know the standard documents so that it can use them as previous version in a 3 ways merge  
18:41 <+tmortagne> but this require a bit of refactoring  
18:42 <+tmortagne> and probably introduce a way for any component to provide this kind of autotically generated document so that both XWiki init and Extension Manager can get the information  
18:42 <+sburjan> makes sense  
18:42 <+sburjan> i was imagining that these documents come with the xar import. I didn't knew they were generated at init  
18:43 <+tmortagne> there is a few of them, the one that are required to have a working empty wiki  
18:43 <+tmortagne> technically XWiki is supposed to be usable as a simple wiki without the full XE UI  
18:44 <+tmortagne> anyway we have it in mind but I'm not sure we created an issue for it after the release so don't hesitate  
18:48 <+tmortagne> looks like we still have have migration issue in 4.1.4  
18:48 <vmassol> yes :(  
18:48 <vmassol> hope Denis isn't too far...  
18:48 <+sburjan> :(  
18:49 <+tmortagne> I did not saw him connected today  
18:49 <+sburjan> who complained ? I don't see anything on users or dev lists  
18:49 <+tmortagne> users list  
18:49 <+tmortagne> the very last one  
18:49 <+tmortagne> "Migration from 2.4 to the latest debian package (4.1.4): Duplicate entry error on R40000XWIKI6990"  
18:50 <+tmortagne> you maybe did not received it yet  
18:50 <+tmortagne> I just got iy  
18:50 <+tmortagne> it  
18:50 <+sburjan> got it now :(  
18:51 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
18:55 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
18:56 <+sburjan> should I tell Silvia to stop testing 4.1.4  full manual ?
